website_summaries.verdict: Twitter is still the most effective way to share quick thoughts and keep up to date with all that's trending. The app's latest redesign makes discovering content easier than before.
pros: One of the best ways to stay up to date with breaking news and the latest cultural trends
cons: Accessing some information is not intuitive
Anonymity can bring out the worst in people

customer_reviews.title: Be careful who you accept as followers
customer_reviews.text: I liked the opportunity to connect with people from across the world and to read their views
customer_reviews.author: Eric Snell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to crash an awful lot so haven't used it recently.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great for tweeters!
customer_reviews.text: I use Twitter on my laptop so it was nice to have a version on my Kindle. I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Blondemax

customer_reviews.title: Why I chose Twitter
customer_reviews.text: Just an extension for my Kindle Fire HD there is nothing more you can say about twitter so i look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: bigyin50

customer_reviews.title: Twitter
customer_reviews.text: What can you say, it's Twitter, not sure how you sign out but hey!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Herts

customer_reviews.title: good app
customer_reviews.text: Great app easy to use on kindle fire hd .easier to see pics than on my phone. I love it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son got this for his Kindle and he loves it x
customer_reviews.author: miss adele gale

customer_reviews.title: Clear but.....
customer_reviews.text: Like the layout and recent improvements, but can't get the character increase that twitlonger allows on other variants such as Tweetcaster. This is a useful feature and it would be good to have it here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: much easier to read your twitter messages on your kindle than on your phone simply because your screen is bigger!! clear and easy and a no-brainer!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Katherine Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Great so easy to install.I'm still learning about Twitter. Totally new to it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Slater

customer_reviews.title: latest app is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: If u r looking to update DON'T!!! This will crash every time you try to open it and if you manage to get it working for more than a few seconds you won't be able to send a tweet. Useless!
customer_reviews.author: luuuuv Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love Twitter
customer_reviews.text: Love twitter use it all he time nd now i have it on my kindle fire even better. Great application for keepng in touch with everyone and people and places i am interested. No problems using it on Kindle
customer_reviews.author: marya parrott

customer_reviews.title: Twitter
customer_reviews.text: Twitter is good because you get to meet new and interesting people
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Trash this version.
customer_reviews.text: This new version crashes all the time on my Kindle Fire HD. I just downloaded it again for the 6th time in the last 2 weeks. Logged in and crashed again within 30 seconds. Just deleted it again, I've had enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Honey

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love twitter! It's a great way of getting in ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love twitter! It's a great way of getting in touch all around the world. I've even been tweeted by my favourite actor Tom Sizemore 👍👌
customer_reviews.author: alyson Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Irritating
customer_reviews.text: Works on everything but videos, for some reason I cannot watch a whole video, only the first 5 seconds plays then it stops!!! Arghhhh!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Fire

customer_reviews.title: twitter
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love twitter due to new kindle fire hd and new iPhone, its great to view celebs tweets x,
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Sonia M Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Twitter phobe
customer_reviews.text: Difficult for me to rank as Twitter befuddles me anyway but am able to check all I need to a Tweet.
customer_reviews.author: milliemoo

customer_reviews.title: Twitter's amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love Twitter and it looks great on my Kindle. Very good way to keep track on what's going off in your social world, or what's going off in news and celebrity.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marie

customer_reviews.title: tweet to tweet
customer_reviews.text: I think twitter is a very good social media site for keeping in touchave.

customer_reviews.title: keep connected
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping up with your fav people and for news and events such as traffic reports. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Mamamadre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good way to keep in touch with friends and family posted abroad with the forces

customer_reviews.title: Crashtastic
customer_reviews.text: Have to open (then watch it close almost immediately) about 30 times then reset kindle rinse and repeat just to read about 4 tweets then as soon as you scroll it crashes again. (Kindle fire hd)
customer_reviews.author: newmummy

customer_reviews.title: Crashes a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This app seems to work fine for 2-3 days then decides to crash! When It crashes I end up deleting the app then reinstalling it. Not the greatest app.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: never get the updates
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is always getting new updates but never on kindle. Plus I'll wake up in the morning and check twitter and it only shows me tweets from the last 2 hours or so

customer_reviews.title: newbie
customer_reviews.text: Great app easy to use even for a dummy like me.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be missing features, so I still have to log on via a web browser for certain tasks.

customer_reviews.title: Good App
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very good. No problems with it so far and very quick to update and change settings on it.

customer_reviews.title: scary
customer_reviews.text: I get scared that someone is using my profile picture of my face because all the Orange eggs that they have on their Twitter pic keeper coming ups as my face 😢😢😢😢

customer_reviews.title: best web invention
customer_reviews.text: this is a 5 star social website can only some it up by saying great try it & you`ll be hooked

customer_reviews.title: never had a problem with this app
customer_reviews.text: This application does what it's supposed to do. Never had a problem so far.

customer_reviews.title: Twitter
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, keeps you in touch and its free. Not a lot else to say about it really.

customer_reviews.author: Mrs Laura Sands

customer_reviews.title: don't bother! #shite
customer_reviews.text: Install twice and it still crashes as you attempt to open it. Works great on the wife's Nexus though.... quick fix is use something that's not a kindle.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Twitter app
customer_reviews.text: whats to say, does what it says on the tin, snappy, responsive, and well worth a download for on the go tweeting
customer_reviews.author: Lee Buckle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love Twitter - even though I was against it to start with. Easy to use and great to keep in touch with all sorts of people.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. Couple of minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall this app is OK. the only gripe I have is the updating of search feeds. Sometimes these update without issue but other times there is no response and the search has to be performed again.
customer_reviews.author: MR S P E GANDER

customer_reviews.title: crash, crash, crash
customer_reviews.text: It no longer works on my kindle and fed up I can't get it to work, no idea why, update perhaps, have no idea when apps update on a kindle
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. R. Soden

customer_reviews.title: Great App
customer_reviews.text: Really good app, works smoothly and seamlessly. Updates quickly really easy to use far better than using the browser on my kindle to get on twitter
customer_reviews.author: MOS

customer_reviews.title: Good to Tweet.
customer_reviews.text: I am an occasional Tweeter so useful to have this App on my Kindle Fire. Works if you have a Wi-Fi spot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Richard C Baxter

customer_reviews.title: having problems
customer_reviews.text: My twitter is constantly crashing and glitching. I am no longer able to post tweets, send dms or follow people and I have no idea why. Twitter used to be such a good app but each update makes it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Tweets galore
customer_reviews.text: Keeping up with the inside gossip is easy on twitter, It ensures you know whats happening and you can take part and voice your opinion on lots of topics

customer_reviews.title: love it

customer_reviews.title: TWITTER

customer_reviews.title: twitter
customer_reviews.text: FABULOUS :-P:-) Tis my first time ever, the best, so chuffed I'm all set up now, only negative, more characters would be good

customer_reviews.text: This was once a very good app however the latest update means it closes itself down as soon as you open it. Until this issue is fixed don't bother downloading it as the app is completely unusable!

customer_reviews.title: easy app

customer_reviews.title: excellent source.
customer_reviews.text: Use Twitter mainly for football and music news, excellent source.

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good but now Doesn't run

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: I can talk to family and friends it is good because I am not allowed facebook so this is another good chatting site to go on

customer_reviews.title: great

customer_reviews.title: New to twitter

customer_reviews.title: Great to have Twitter on the Kindle!
customer_reviews.text: The Twitter app on the Kindle has a very nice layout and is easy to navigate. Would highly recommend downloading if you tweet regularly.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the app everything seems to be perfect and does never lag which is really really good :D

customer_reviews.title: Pictures not working the same
customer_reviews.text: The slide up and down motion for pictures to go doesn't work. And some pictures were just links in a tweet instead of the picture itself.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute cack, keeps crashing all the time!.
customer_reviews.text: Sort it out guys, you are representing the worlds biggest social network ...

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical

customer_reviews.title: New update is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This app was update and now doesn't work, open it up and crashes immediately. Please sort it out, as I really miss using this app.

customer_reviews.title: Faultless
customer_reviews.text: A faultless twitter application. Does exactly what you would expect it to do, and can't say better than that really

customer_reviews.title: twitter
customer_reviews.text: easy app to download and works great on the Kindle fire HD. Would recommend this app to anyone using a kindle fire

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant app and works great on my kindle! Would definitely recommend to people and I'm extremely happy with it. Thanks :)

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: This app is great, does everything I need it to and I can keep in touch with all my friends and update with new news

customer_reviews.title: marvellous

customer_reviews.title: twitter

customer_reviews.title: For tweet fans!
customer_reviews.text: Love this app and it's so much easier to navigate in the tablet version! Would highly recommend downloading this if you're a fan of tweeting!

customer_reviews.title: Twittertastic
customer_reviews.text: Its twitter! what is there not to love. I have never had any issues with the app and would defiantly suggest it.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Twitter and keeping up with anything and everything going on in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E.

customer_reviews.title: App
customer_reviews.text: The twitter app is just as good as any facebook, fantasy football, pinterest, email, etc. apps. You can do whatever you need to for your twitter account, updates, and followings.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria King

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the website, better than an app.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good app for me to read Twitter while I'm in my bed and want to catch the last Tweets before I go to bed. *addicted*

customer_reviews.title: love love love it

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to navigate and use, i hate it when something so simple has to be overly complicated. This app makes it very easy to see whats going on with out having to waste a lot time
customer_reviews.author: DitterDew

customer_reviews.title: Tweetley deetley deet.
customer_reviews.text: I tweet all the time. This app is the official twitter app from Twitter, and as far as I'm concerned, it's the best for twitter users.
customer_reviews.author: D.J. and Deanne Strong

customer_reviews.title: It's Twitter
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am rating my aps that I use daily. This one is good, it helps keep up to date with my business and personal friends.

customer_reviews.title: I just read comments
